name: Alex Vaughn
text: Good Pizza with plenty of options for toppings. I Was not completely satisfied with the service based on a few simple things like bringing the pizza to my table after it being prepared, but I do have standards when it comes to customer service.
Quick with amazing service! Truly impressed by service and quality coming from someone who works in the industry! Must taste and check out!

name: Kiran
text: Without a doubt, this is hands down my favorite pizza place in south Florida and, dare I say, the entirety of Florida. The customer service is excellent, the ingredients are healthy, fresh and some are organic, the pizza is just the perfect ‚Ä¶More

name: Jose Perez
text: Its a pretty good restaurant. We start the pizza from 0, basically the costumer selects which kind of dough they want then we add the sausage, cheese and toppings based on the costumer's decision. It's an awesome pizza restaurant and innovative. I'd recommend it to anyone

name: Sean O'Hanlon
text: This place has OUTSTANDING pizza. Where else can you "build your own" right in front of you? The service is good (fast & friendly) and the prices are very reasonable considering you can have all the toppings you want. This is my Go-to place for pizza in the Gables. Give it a try. You won't regret it.

name: Geekmaster General
text:
Amazing food. Reasonable prices. Great options. I go here regularly.

Edited: they closed down unfortunately.

name: Ale Venegas
text: Great pizza with a side of novelty. You get to craft your own pizza, choose from a variety of crusts, sauces, cheeses and toppings. Also, if you're not in the mood for pizza, craft your own salad instead. Great if you're a carnivore or a ‚Ä¶More

name: Ann D
text: This has quickly become my favorite pizza place!  For one low price you get your choice of crust, sauce, cheese and whatever toppings from their vast options.  The pizza is always delicious and quickly made.  The staff is always courteous and friendly.  Save room for their dessert pizza!

name: Sarah Schoening
text: Fantastic food and service!! The pizza was delicious, quick, and a great price! Definitely try the dessert pizza! The staff was all extremely friendly and helpful, and all of the pizzas are totally customizable (including lots of gluten free and vegan options) with no extra charges! Would highly recommend, can't wait to go back!

name: misamifraful
text: I agree with the comparison with Subway, just with pizza instead of sandwich. We ate different pizzas tonight, each was good, hot and crunchy, which is the way we like, but you can order different bases. The service very fast, so you can ‚Ä¶More

name: tarara perez
text: Incredibly easy and innovative process they have. It works similarly to Subway. In other words, you choose the dough, movie towards the sausage section and chose what you want from what they offer. Same thing with the cheese and the toppings (pepperoni, meats or veggies)I totally recommend

name: Enrique Enriquez
text: This place is so good for lunch and the best part is that its quick since its usually not too busy. The bread on the pizza is so thin and crispy and cooked to the perfect level. Absolutely delicious.

name: Alejandra Lorenzo
text: For those of us that love pizza and have sensitivities, this is the place to go. They make every effort to accommodate. And the pizza is also good. üòä

name: Alex Gilroy
text: Very bland burgers for the price.  Good on paper, but they come out bad.  French fries are pretty bad as well, just sort of bland.  Not crunchy, but not soft, almost flavorless.  Good drink selection though if that's important to you.  Wait ‚Ä¶More

name: Gissi Hall
text: Pizzas taste awesome. Affordable good food. Customize your own pizza ans experiment as much as you want! Healthy options are also available (customization of salads also possible).

name: Julie Erika
text: Best pizza I've had in Miami!!!!!!! The thin crust is perfectly toasted. The ingredients were super fresh. I love this place. ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Clau Borg
text: Great pizza! And very fast and friendly service. I was out the door with my food in less than 10 minutes.

name: Cristina Delvat
text: Loved this place. Affordable prices, no premium on extra toppings and fast, friendly service. Oh yeah, they also have beer!

name: Isaiah Kim-Martinez
text: AMAZING. Tastiest pizza I've tasted in Coral Gables, and you can customize all you want for a very affordable price! I got a thin-crust pepperoni and mushroom pizza with alfredo sauce for just $8.95. Perfect personal size to feel content ‚Ä¶More
